Interface EnemyStateHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
AttackingState, IdleState, MovingState, TurningState
public interface EnemyStateHandler
Defines the contract for a specific state in an enemy's state machine. Each implementation of this interface will manage the logic for one particular state, such as Idle, Attacking, or Moving.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    enter(Enemy enemy)
    Called once when the enemy enters this state.
    void
    exit(Enemy enemy)
    Called once when the enemy exits this state.
    void
    update(Enemy enemy, EnemyBehavior context, long currentTime, Level levelData, Player player)
    Called on every game tick while the enemy is in this state.

  • Method Details

    • enter

      void enter(Enemy enemy)
      Called once when the enemy enters this state.
      Parameters:
      enemy - The enemy entering the state.

    • update

      void update(Enemy enemy, EnemyBehavior context, long currentTime, Level levelData, Player player)
      Called on every game tick while the enemy is in this state.
      Parameters:
      enemy - The enemy to update.
      context - The behavior context that manages this state.
      currentTime - The current system time.
      levelData - The current level's data.
      player - The player object.

    • exit

      void exit(Enemy enemy)
      Called once when the enemy exits this state.
      Parameters:
      enemy - The enemy exiting the state.
